author: Jbmckenzie
post_text: May 14, 2021 at 6:15â€¯AM#1If I want to store fixture instances through a macro I could do the following...> Group 1 ; If Fixture *.1 ;  Store Group @But lets say I want to store multiple instance into one group for a fixture like a JDC1, only wanting the color channels, the following will not work...> Group 1 ; If Fixture *.2 thru *14 ;  Store Group @Is there a work around so I do not have to have a new line for each instance?Thanks.
title: Storing Instances Question
